action.text: Senate vitiated previous adoption of amendment SA 463 to the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 463 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 463 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S3236-3237; text: CR S3237) To make a technical correction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 463 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 463 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Biden.
